entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.

entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
